description:
Life in the centre lane. These responsive skis are race-ready and fitness forward for skate skiers obsessed with performance. With an agressive sidecut, you can lean into your stride with more confidence and efficiency. Edges are refined for powerful push off. Their double guide groove guide helps the ski track in a range of positions.

  • Active cap construction flexes from tip to tail and offers good torsional rigidity
  • Extended edge offers good control and glide
  • Nomex honeycomb core for competition-caliber performance
  • Double guide groove for good control in different positions
  • Racing Cobra sidecut for solid stance and push off
  • K7000 graphite base glides on variable snow conditions
  • Compatible with NNN bindings and includes pre-mounted IFP plates
name: Rossignol Delta Comp Skate Skis - Unisex
